name: WooCommerce Addon for PayUbiz
author: wapinfosystems

sections.description:
In order to use the PayUbiz gateway you need a PayU merchant account.
Note that the plugin only works if the currency is set to Indian Rupee.

Features

  • Payment using payubiz
  • woocommerce supported
sections.installation:
How to install the Payu Biz Woocommerce Addon

Please follow the steps for your Woocommerce Addon installation below:

VIA WordPress

  1. After your download log into your WordPress admin interface
  2. After login click on Plugins from the left hand menu
  3. Click on Add new
  4. Click on Upload
  5. Browse to the directory you downloaded the plugin to and click Install Now
  6. After WordPress has finished unpacking the file click on Activate Plugin
  7. Done. Start placing shortcode!

VIA FTP

  1. After your download unzip woocommerce-payu from your download.zip
  2. Open your FTP client
  3. Browse to /your_wp_instalation/wp-content/plugins/ on your hosting server
  4. Uplaod whatsapp share into this directory
  5. Go to your wordpress admin panel
  6. Go to plugins and activate WooCommerce Plugin for PayUbiz
  7. Done. Start placing shortcode!
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

How to install the Payu Biz Woocommerce Addon

Please follow the steps for your Woocommerce Addon installation below:

VIA WordPress

  1. After your download log into your WordPress admin interface
  2. After login click on Plugins from the left hand menu
  3. Click on Add new
  4. Click on Upload
  5. Browse to the directory you downloaded the plugin to and click Install Now
  6. After WordPress has finished unpacking the file click on Activate Plugin
  7. Done. Start placing shortcode!

VIA FTP

  1. After your download unzip woocommerce-payu from your download.zip
  2. Open your FTP client
  3. Browse to /your_wp_instalation/wp-content/plugins/ on your hosting server
  4. Uplaod whatsapp share into this directory
  5. Go to your wordpress admin panel
  6. Go to plugins and activate WooCommerce Plugin for PayUbiz
  7. Done. Start placing shortcode!

Does it support latest latest version of woocommerce and wordpress

You it support

Does your plugin require any coding knowledge (php, css or html)?

No not required.

Does plugin support payumoney?

No plugin do not support payumoney.
